name: exemplarily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is very good and suitable to be copied by other people: The world number one was exemplarily gracious in defeat. They perform their jobs exemplarily, and contribute to the smooth running of the company.
in a way that is severe and intended as a warning to other people: They were only loyal to the king because traitors were exemplarily punished. He was exemplarily imprisoned for three months.
